name: PlasmodiumSpeciesTestsByMicroscopicObservationInBlood
title: Plasmodium species (Tests by Microscopic Observation in Blood)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Plasmodium species in blood by microscopy.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Plasmodium species microscopy; 
Scale = blood;  LOINC search: "plasmodium (microscopy or film)" and "Erythrocytes.Plasmodium"),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
